title: Using backspace key to go back one URL
content: I used to be able to use the backspace key to go back one URL in a given window. Now, even though I have gone to about:config and changed browser.backspace_action = 0 to 'true', this no longer works, at least not with my new Windows 11 computer. I tried closing and re-opening Mozilla with the new preference, and again with closing, restarting the computer, and then re-opening Mozilla. Please help if you can. Thank you so much.
creator: jozierabyor

title: Can the Picture-in-Picture Seek forward/backward Media Controls be customised?
content: By default the Picture-in-Picture Seek forward/backward Media Controls are set to 5 seconds, is there a way to change the 5 second increments to say 10 seconds?
creator: PocketRocket

title: Can't watch Netflix on Firefox! Error code: F7111-1331
content:
It has been a week, and I still can't watch Netflix on Firefox! Error code: F7111-1331

Now I have to watch Netflix on Google Chrome. Why tho?! :(
creator: littlemi811

title: Addon for managing large amounts of tabs?
content: I could generate even 3000 tabs when i was peaking reading philosophy... Browsers are so moronic and UI didn't change since 1999, is there some addon for managing large amounts of tabs and organizing them, saving them for later? It is information age, we literally work with so many information, yet UI is so moronic it leads to information overload, not to mention i can't work efficiently like this...
creator: empleat

title: Não muda o idioma
content: usando a versão 121.0a1 (2023-11-05) (64-bit) ( Distribuição linux Deepin ) e não consigo deixa o navegador em português mesmo colocando o idioma e deixando ele no topo usando o repositório apt novo
creator: marcelorazera.br

title: Facebook and Edge
content: My Facebook icon on my Taskbar disappeared and I can't get it pinned back to the Taskbar. If I pin it and click on it, it goes to Microsoft Edge browser instead of Facebook. Very frustrating!
creator: jbndwn
